channel.title: Java Error help
channel.description:
Ok, I will try to make this as easy for an expert as possible. Here goes:
I read about Moparscape thingy and thought, that sounds cool. So I download it. I run it and install it. Everything seems fine then I click on the DOS run thing and kaboom. Java error. I download the newer Moparscape. Kaboom, error. I install the newer version of java and that bloody comes up with some error halfway through installing cabinet files. Any help would be very appriciated. And also is it runescape grapics or something totally different?
This is the error I get after half installing the new Java thingy.
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: java/lang/StringBuild er at Bot.<clinit>(Bot.java:103) Press any key to continue . . .
